medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: A non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce pain and inflammation.
medicines.side_effects: Headache, upset stomach, skin rash, or increased sensitivity to the sun
medicines.precautions: Do not take with naproxen or aspirin, if pregnant or breastfeeding, or if you have a heart condition.

medicines.name: Lisinopril
medicines.description: An ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and congestive heart failure.
medicines.side_effects: Low blood pressure, fluid retention, cough, shortness of breath, or fatigue.
medicines.precautions: If pregnant or breastfeeding, or if you have heart problems, kidney problems, or low blood pressure, consult your doctor before taking.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: An oral medication used to treat type 2 diabetes.
medicines.side_effects: Low blood sugar, numbness, or tingling, blurred vision, or unpleasant taste.
medicines.precautions: Do not take with glipizide or glimepiride, if you have a heart condition, kidney problems, or diabetic ketoacidosis, or if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

medicines.name: Albuterol
medicines.description: A short-acting bronchodilator used to treat asthma and open the airways for better breathing.
medicines.side_effects: Nausea, dizziness, fast heartbeat, chest tightness, or shortness of breath.
medicines.precautions: Do not take if you have narrow-angle glaucoma, cardiac arrhythmias, or blood pressure problems.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: An antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
medicines.side_effects: Diarrhea, upset stomach, sore throat, or change in taste or smell.
medicines.precautions: Do not take if you are allergic to penicillin, if you have a stomach ulcer, kidney disease, or severe skin rash.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever and relieve mild to moderate pain from conditions such as muscle aches, toothaches, menstrual cramps, and headaches.
medicines.precaution: Avoid taking aspirin on an empty stomach to reduce the risk of stomach upset.

medicines.name: Valium (Diazepam)
medicines.description: Diazepam is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures. It works by calming the brain and nerves.
medicines.precaution: Avoid alcohol and operate machinery cautiously while taking diazepam, as it may cause drowsiness.

medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.side_effect: Rare, but may cause skin rash
medicines.description: Paracetamol is a common pain reliever and fever reducer. It is often used to alleviate mild to moderate pain from conditions such as muscle aches, headaches, and toothaches.
medicines.precaution: Do not exceed the recommended dosage to avoid potential liver damage.

medicines.name: Ciprofloxacin
medicines.description: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections, including urinary tract infections and respiratory tract infections.
medicines.precaution: Avoid taking ciprofloxacin with dairy products or calcium-fortified juices, and stay hydrated while using this medication.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor used to reduce stomach acid. It is commonly prescribed to treat conditions such as gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and stomach ulcers.
medicines.precaution: Take omeprazole before meals for optimal effectiveness and inform your doctor of any persistent side effects.

medicines.name: Amlodipine
medicines.side_effect: Swelling of ankles or feet, dizziness
medicines.description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina). It works by relaxing blood vessels, allowing blood to flow more smoothly.
medicines.precaution: Notify your doctor if you experience severe swelling, lightheadedness, or rapid weight gain.
